评论详情: I've got this in a couple of colors. I wouldn't call it "loose" but it's not fitted, either. Really like the cap sleeve - it is flattering. The colors are heathered so aren't as bright/vivid as they look in the photos.
I bought this to match with a cardigan and it was perfect. Good quality, fit as expected.
Fits nice, size up. Doesn't Cling and has great color options and is super soft. Affordable.
Material is thin and size runs small. Doesn't fit. I will be returning it.
The sleeves were huge … short sleeves great but why so wide ….
Loose fit and comfortable, requires a tank top underneath.  Flattering
This is a go to t shirt for sporting events. Very soft. Love the quality. I would purchase again.

This shirt is very soft but it's also very see-through. I was in the market for a white basic tee that I could throw on quickly and not have to worry about it being see-through. Unfortunately, this isn't it. I do love the material but wish it was a little thick to provide some additional modesty. It does fit great and is very flattering but I have to wear a tank top underneath it.

I’m usually very picky when it comes to my shirts and this one is really comfortable and the quality is good, I will be buying more in different colors!

I ordered two of these in different shades of blue and wear them frequently. They work great as a stand alone in warm weather or layered in the fall/winter. They wash well and are not showing wash wear.  Very flattering, too. Great purchase!

Bought this for a cool, summer top. It has so far held its shape well and looks super cute with shorts or jeans.

The AUTOMET Women's Tops Summer Basic T Shirts offer a comfortable and stylish option for everyday wear. The loose fit and cap sleeves provide a relaxed feel, making them perfect for casual outings or even a more relaxed office environment. The fabric seems to be of decent quality and the colors are vibrant. While the sizing might run a bit large for some, overall, these tops are a good value and a versatile addition to any wardrobe.
Love this fabric and it's wear ability is so comfy. True to size, figure flattering. No clinginess.

I bought this t-shirt in black and the teal green aqua color. I was only able to wear the black t-shirt for 1 minute. It felt extremely itchy against the skin. The green shirt fit well and was soft against the skin. The black tee felt like a burlap sack.
I ordered these in a lot of colors!!! I’m a Large and it fits like it should not too tight and is length is perfect
Soft material. Holds well in the wash too. Fave shirt!
Looks like the photo is a good fit and soft material
Good material Runs small Sleeves are really short

I ordered this shirt to get it quickly to use a cricket on.  I couldn't be happier! The tshirt is soft and a great length so that it doesn't show my skin when I raise my arms.  It has a cap sleeve, but I love that about this shirt! I have ordered 3 (2 grey and one blue) so far and they will be my go to the next time I need a tshirt! It's flattering, washes well, and hasn't shrunk at all! Very pleased!
This is a great little T-shirt. I like the high collar on it. And I love the colors. I bought two.
I love the comfort of this shirt. It never shrunk, it doesn’t cling and the material is a good thickness which keeps you warm but not hot. It has been my go-to shirt very often.
Excellent quality!! I’ve washed many times and still looks like day one. I’ve bought three of these in different colors.

I have ordered a wine colored shirt as a medium and a black colored shirt as an xl. I love the wine colored shirt! It's comfortable and soft! Since it was more form fitting on my I wanted to try a larger size. The black xl is so uncomfortable to wear, it's very itchy. I waited too long and can't return it, but I can't wear it because it is so uncomfortable. Also, the only big difference in sizing is in the arms. I was so excited with my first purchase, but very disappointed in my second purchase.
I love the light weight material of this shirt.  Washes well and ibwere it alot. It's perfect to dress up or down. I generally where medium and this medium fit perfect. Ordering in different colors!
Love! This shirt is perfect and fits accurately according to size chart. It is super comfy and cute!
I bought two colors. Love the fit.
Good fit. Dresses an outfit up just enough to be business casual without going crazy. Washes well. Comfortable.

This shirt is an absolute wardrobe staple that perfectly blend style, comfort, and versatility. From the moment I put on this top, I was impressed by its softness and lightweight feel. The fabric is a high-quality blend that breathes well, making it ideal for those hot summer days when staying cool is a must.  The design of this shirt is effortlessly chic. The loose fit provides a relaxed, comfortable feel without looking sloppy, making it perfect for both casual and business casual settings. I particularly love the cap sleeves, which add a feminine touch and make the top a bit more dressy than your average T-shirt. The scoop neckline is flattering and versatile, allowing me to easily accessorize with necklaces or scarves.  One of the best aspects of this top is its versatility. I've worn it with everything from jeans and shorts to skirts and dress pants, and it always looks great. It's also a fantastic layering piece. I can throw on a blazer or cardigan for a more polished look or wear it on its own for a laid-back, summery vibe. The range of colors available means there's an option to suit every style and occasion.  The fit is true to size, with just the right amount of stretch to ensure it hugs in all the right places without being too tight. After several washes, it has held up beautifully, with no signs of shrinking or losing its shape. The stitching is strong and durable, ensuring that this top will be a long-lasting addition to my wardrobe.  Overall, this shirt has exceeded my expectations in every way. They combine comfort and style effortlessly, making them a go-to choice for any occasion. Whether I'm dressing up for work or keeping it casual on the weekend, these tops have become my favorite.
Fit was great, comfortable to wear, length was perfect. Washed, dried and keeps its shape. I bought a couple and was not disappointed. Good summer casual wear
Love this top for everyday wear. Got it in 3 colors.
Love this shirt. It's comfy, flattering, and pairs well with jeans or as business casual!
You can dress it up or down, bought in another color because I liked it so much
I now have this in 3 colors - I love this SO much! Very cute style, so soft and great fit- not too snug but not baggy at all. Plan to get more!!
Great fit! I am a large breasted female and don’t like clingy tight tops and this tee short was perfection
This shirt I ordered big I thought it would shrink ,but it didn't very comfortable style is nice .
Sent this as a gift to my young niece and she was pleased with the fit, the style, and the color and I am pleased she liked her present.
I got this shirt in a small and four colors and the only one that was an actual small was the black. The magenta,, and white were so big I was drowning in them.
Nice size. Very flattering. Can dress up or dress down.

Very soft fabric and comfortable. Fits nicely

If your looking for a feel good, look good, superb quality then look no further. These tee's are definitely "on point"! And lastly, affordable. I will 100% guaranteed I will shop with Automet again. Wear tucked or untucked.

Beautiful color, flattering fit, so happy with this shirt.

These tops come in a range of lovely colors, and they are very soft and comfortable to wear.  At the same time, they have a flattering fit--close without being tight.  I am so glad I bought several of these in different colors!
Fits well and is comfortable

评论概述: Bought several colors. Dark colors fit better
评论详情: I bought several different colors and while these tops are comfortable fabric, the fit isn’t perfect. Darker colors like black and wine fit a bit better than the same size in the other colors which had bigger/longer arm holes.

It’s soft, it’s so flattering- I am large chested and most t-shirts just don’t fit right. This somehow just hangs perfectly and comfortably. I ordered several more in other colors- you can’t go wrong with this one.

If you’re shaped like a flat board, this shirt will fit you great. I am 5’7” and curvy with very wide shoulders. I bought an XL which is usually one size up for me, it hugs EVERY THING and fits like a medium. The sleeves are also cut much shorter than the item , which should be advertised as a boat neck wife-beater.

I want to love these. I bought 2 of the smalls in the same color. They fit great everywhere. However, i just didn't like how the sleeves fell. It's like just over the shoulder and not quite a sleeve. Looked strange on my arm. Def not as long as the picture.

I bought this shirt and the oversized shirt by the same brand.  Both are so soft. This shirt fits just loose enough without clinging to all my "extra " curves. Very comfortable. The color is exactly as my screen displayed. I will buy more.
Didn’t fit as described
Love the purple color. Can dress it up or wear with jeans. Very soft material

I bought four different colors of these, and might buy more. I love the softness of the material and how basic they are. I just wanted plain shirts that I could dress down or up and these are it. Very true to size. Not too thick. Def buying more colors.
More snug than I thought

Really like this well fitting shirt, and the comfortable material. I ordered a small, but the sleeves are a bit too short, but other than that, I love it.
